transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello? Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hi sir, this is Pallavi. Pallavi from IndiaMART sir. How are you?
Customer: I am fine madam. Ji boliye na madam.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Ji bolo madam. To kal aapne application download karke install kar liya hai?
Customer: Download kar diya tha magar abhi wo update nahi kar diya tha madam. Number ka switch off wo sim unhone nahi dala tha.
Executive: Okay aapka jo number hai aap primary number enter karke abhi OTP dal ke usko verify nahi kiya?
Customer: Nahi nahi kiya madam. Primary number wo thoda phone band ho gaya.
Executive: Accha accha. Kya dikkat hai usme primary number mein?
Customer: Nahi dikkat nahi hai. Phone thoda kharab ho gaya.
Executive: Accha accha. Iske liye wo repairing shop mein diya tha. Aaj kya ho payega. Primary number nahi to mail ka message aata hai madam nahi to?
Customer: Mail pe aa jayega?
Executive: Nahi mail pe nahi aayega sir mobile pe hi aayega.
Customer: Mobile pe hi aayega. Dusre phone mein dal lijiye na. Sim kisi other phone mein dal lijiye. Aap jab dalenge to usme OTP aa jayega.
Customer: Aa jayega magar wo hone ke baad me isme dal ke karte rehte hai na. Iske liye main sim nahi dala tha usme nikal gaya. Aaj kya ho payega madam aaj sham tak ho payega?
Executive: Nahi nahi aap bataiye sim hai aapke pass?
Customer: Abhi sim ko nahi hai madam. Mere bhai ke pass hai wo bhi ghar pe rakh ke gaya tha fir wo office ko gaya tha.
Executive: Okay okay. Sir to dekhiye hamari taraf se to kuch pending nahi hai. Aapko apna wo sim kisi mobile mein dalna hai. OTP aa jayega. OTP lekar aapke mobile mein wo application start ho jayega. You save my number ha ha ha. You save my number Pallavi from IndiaMART sir. In case you still need any help you can just call me on this number.
Customer: Main usme le leta definitely I will sure madam.
Executive: Okay right thank you.
Executive: Okay this is Pallavi from IndiaMART you just save this number.
Customer: Okay okay okay madam.
Executive: Okay sir so anything else anything else sir you want my help sir?
Customer: Abhi hai to nahi hai madam.
Executive: Theek hai sir. So aapka jo ye customer care mein complaint aaya tha main complaint close kar du?
Customer: Ha close kar dijiye na bas.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Aapko kuch nahi karna hai. Accha ek minute ek minute ek minute ek minute madam. Boliye. Aur do din se fir order bhi nahi aaya thoda dummy dummy dummy ek order aa raha hai madam kyu?
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Do din se fir thoda dummy order aa raha hai fir wo time pass karne ke liye aisa kuch abhi maine check kar liya tha fir ab dusra naam check karne ke baad me bhi aa gaya aisa kuch bol raha tha.
Executive: Aapka jo aaj buylead ye use kiya hai gypsum board wala na?
Customer: Ha ha. Ha to kya bola gypsum board ye buyer inse baat ho gaya sir gypsum board ka jo requirement tha Pawan?
Customer: Ha ha baat baat baat hua tha. Magar unhone maine check kar liya tha fir. Wo galti se aa gaya main dusre check karne ke baad me bhi aa gaya aisa kuch bol raha tha. Do din se fir kuch order hi nahi hai kal se aaj ka bhi.
Executive: Hmm. Aur niche sir niche do buylead aapne use kiya hai kal. Saddam hai Hyderabad se. Inse baat hua?
Customer: Ha ha baat hua tha magar unhone Hyderabad ke nahi hai main dusra ka hai bengalore se baat karunga bol ke bol raha hun.
Executive: Accha. Baki requirement unka genuine tha?
Customer: Nahi bengalore mein requirement aayega to bol raha hun. Idhar nahi to Hyderabad mein nahi tha.
Executive: Accha. Aur ye last Hyderabad ka ek aur tha. Ek aur lead tha sir Hyderabad ka Shiva from for gypsum board. Inse baat hua hai?
Customer: Unse bhi baat hua tha magar unhone phone cut kar de raha fir. Abhi requirement hai hai kehte bol cut kar de raha bas aur kuch nahi.
Executive: Accha accha. Sir dekhiye kabhi kabhhar ho jata hai na hamare pass buyer kabhi kabhi sirf inquiry ke liye bhi aa jata hai. Theek hai. Koi problem nahi hai sir aap ignore kariye baki abhi jo fresh leads aapko daily milti hai aap apna daily fresh lead use kariye koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Acchi baat acchi baat hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aapko aapne mobile mein aapko application dalna hai application aapka wo number dal ke OTP dal ke chalu ho jayega koi problem nahi hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay okay okay okay madam definitely.
Executive: Hope sir you are satisfied after talking to me?
Customer: No no no no madam. Happy hai khushi hai.
Executive: You are not satisfied with me? Satisfied satisfied satisfied but complaint hai to main aapko bata deta hun.
Executive: Okay okay sir.
Customer: Okay okay right thank you.
Executive: Ha sir koi bhi you need any help just call call me on this number sir. Okay sir. Thank you so much for your time sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to verify application due to phone issue.

- Receiving dummy orders.

- Some buyers are cutting the call.



Resolution:

- Advised to insert SIM in another phone.

- Advised to ignore dummy leads.

- Advised to use daily fresh leads.

- Complaint will be closed.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- application, verification, buyleads, dummy orders
